task_description: Fix mobile layout issues across all Prompt Tools tabs (Recipes, Library, Wildcards, Styles). Issues include overflow, buttons off-screen, and content cut off on mobile devices.

patterns.responsive_grid: Use grid-cols-1 for mobile, progressively increase: sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4
patterns.button_collapse: Use hidden md:flex for desktop buttons, flex md:hidden with DropdownMenu for mobile
patterns.text_hiding: Use hidden sm:inline for text labels on tabs/buttons, keep icons always visible
patterns.overflow_handling: Parent overflow-hidden, scrollable child flex-1 overflow-auto min-h-0
patterns.dialog_mobile: Use max-w-[calc(100%-2rem)] and max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto for mobile dialogs

existing_implementations.description: WildCardManager already has responsive grid. PromptToolsTabs has hidden sm:inline pattern. PromptLibraryCard has MoreVertical dropdown but only for secondary actions.

constraints: DO NOT modify any gallery-related files (UnifiedImageGallery, ImageGallery, etc.)
Use Tailwind responsive classes, not JavaScript media queries
